short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Offers an enhanced Unify Phone experience by keeping the same tab when it is launched from another app.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: The Unify Phone extension enhances the Unify Phone experience by avoiding cross launch, in multiple tabs, when the user chooses to start a Unify Video call.
long.de: Offers an enhanced Unify Phone experience by keeping the same tab when it is launched from another app.
